author: bpendleton
msg: DERBY-2845: Improve devguide tips on debugging deadlocks
This change adds some additional content to the Development Guide page on
debugging deadlocks. The additional content provides more information
about how to use the SYSCS_DIAG.LOCK_TABLE diagnostic table, and also
points to detailed information available in the Derby wiki.

author: digy
msg: LUCENENET-293 Improper casing on PhraseQuery.Add overload

author: rwatler
msg: PSML page templates and fragment definitions checkpoint commit
- Added basic functionality to PortalSite component and APIs to support PageTemplate and FragmentDefinition PSML, lookup, and aggregation.
- Extended PortalSite test cases to include new PageTemplate and FragmentDefinition APIs.
- Upgraded construction of ContentPage in ProfilerValve and PageLayoutComponent to include optional PageTemplate and FragmentDefinitions map.
- Cleaned up PortletActionSecurityPathBehavior logic to use ProfilerValve instance to reprofile current request.
- Maintained locate page logic in JetspeedRequestContext to follow ProfilerValve upgrades.
